original_text: After Jesus became alive again, those people came up out of those places. They went into God's city, Jerusalem. Many people saw them there.
korean_text: 예수의 부활 후에 그들이 무덤에서 나와서 거룩한 성에 들어가 많은 사람에게 보이니라

sentences.original_text: those people came up out of those places
They went into God's city, Jerusalem
